divs: Sighting Detailswe were drivung on I75 just past the tylersville exit in Butler County Ohio my husband pointed out the meteor looking thing we saw it was fiery red and orange with a sort of tail. then it burst into 3 parts then all of the sudden we saw what looked like 4 lights hovering, we pulled onto the side of th road to watch, they just hovered then they just all disappered as if they were never there. It was fascinating and may not be UFO related but wanted to report it just in case. We have not stopped talking about it, I even called my dad to tell him. I look forward to seeing if anyone else brings it up.
Summary: saw what looked like a meteor falling and then saw the lights
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Monroe
There were no other sightings in Monroe on or around September 5th 2009
